text: Yamato () is a city in central Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan. It has been recognized as a special city since 2000.Jacobs, A.J. "Japan's Evolving Nested Municipal Hierarchy: The Race for Local Power in the 2000s," Urban Studies Research (2011), Table 3; retrieved 2012-12-18. ==Geography== Yamato is in the plains of north-central Kanagawa Prefecture. ===Nearby cities=== *Zama *Fujisawa *Ebina *Sagamihara *Ayase *Yokohama *Machida, Tokyo ==References== == Other websites == * Official website in Japanese, English and Spanish Category:Cities in Kanagawa Prefecture
title: Yamato, Kanagawa
